name: Sloshbucklers
description:
Arrrr maties! This is Sloshbucklers, a pirate arcade game in which you survive the seven deadly seas while getting progressively more drunk or "sloshed" if you will. Set sail, fend off invaders, load cannons and fire! If you survive drink! If not, sink!!!

Made and submitted as an entry for GMTK game jam 2020

BUILD ON PAGE IS BROKEN, HERE IS THE LINK TO THE WORKING ONE: Here

Scott Jonske - Music and VFX

Rob Moreno - Art (@rmoreno1138)

Haley Sullivan - Art (@hsullyyy)
